attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increase significantly and if possible deport the perpetrators found guilty of gang raping and scaring for life with 50% burns a young girl with the mental age of 8.  Their sentences were shockingly lenient - up to 9 years!  This should at least be doubled and the Angolan and Jamaican born immigrants deported after having served their sentences.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
